title: March 2
description:
Felix spent Saturday night at Benjamin's. During this much-anticipated sleepover, the boys started writing their very own chapter book. Benjamin's mom sent us the text she found on her computer (Ben is only 5, but writing at a 3rd grade level). Here it is:

The Bee Story

  1. The bee building
    2. There were practically four lands. One was Cat Land, one was Pray Mantis Land, one was Bee Land, And there is a pray mantis named pray majic. Now comes the storyâ€¦

    Once upon a bee

  2. Getting nectar for honey
  3. Giving honey to the queen
  4. The queen likes the honey
  5. the duel
  6. everybody is sad
... watch out, J.K. Rowling!

When Felix learned that Dean had read it, he asked, "Didn't you find the last two chapters sad?"

children.title: Tooth Fairy
children.description: Milo likes to pretend he is the Tooth Fairy. You have to pretend you lost a tooth, and he puts a little surprise under your pillow.

children.title: Pajama Day
children.description:
On Pajama Day at school you wear your PJ's and fuzzy slippers and eat pancakes.

Bahia's next to Milo, and Abigale's behind. Milo's teacher Vanessa is the one frantically searching for pancake stuff.

children.title: 100th Day
children.description: While Milo's class enjoyed Pajama Day, Felix's class celebrated the 100th day of school. Each kid brought one hundred something (pennies, seashells, M&M's, legos...). Felix decided to bring "100 things to draw with".

children.title: Bianca
children.description: Bianca nuzzles to Felix for a photo op. Bianca is what Felix calls a "kissy girl". Kissy girls don't miss an opportunity to cover boys with kisses and hugs. Felix doesn't object to kissy girls per se, though he does find the affection unwarranted because it's not from a close friend.

children.title: Yoga Mat
children.description:
Felix is on week 4 of an after-school yoga class. He loves it. He proudly refers to himself as a yogi. The instructor talks a lot about meditation. Felix is hooked. Felix reports that his favorite method for finding his "happy place" is to think of Baby Dog's blue eyes. "When I look into his eyes for a long time, I feel like he is alive. And then, it's like I am leaving my body and going into his body; and I feel calm and happy."

When Felix said, "I'm a yogi", Milo instantly said, "I'm a play-ee!"

children.title: Yoga Bag
children.description: Lucie made Felix a bag for his yoga mat.  It's from fabric that used to be curtains in her childhood home. Good karma.
